amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce spending in the bill by $10.52 billion which represents the uncommitted funds from the $61.7 billion in 2009 stimulus funds that were appropriated for transportation and housing related programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in part A of House Report 111-578 to reduce spending in the bill by $10.52 billion. This amount represents the uncommitted funds from the $61.7 billion in 2009 stimulus funds that were appropriated for transportation and housing related program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 247 (Roll no. 492).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Neugebauer.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 247 (Roll no. 492).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
